name: TinyTown (Karroteu)
description:
TinyTown is a very simple game, styled to look a bit like SimCity 2000. I'm creating it in HTML5, and is packaged using Electron.

It is a simple game with just a few buildings at the moment

The goal of the game is to provide a great town for "citizens" to live in.

You can find instructions inside the game

In development for 6 days, and it would be greatly appreciated if you'd consider donating a bit
